custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.referrerClassPK AS referrerClassPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className AS className, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance ON (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) AND (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.referrerClassName = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className) AND (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.referrerClassPK = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK) INNER JOIN ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer ON (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.analyticsEventId = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.analyticsEventId) WHERE (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId = ?) AND (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.referrerClassPK AS referrerClassPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.alias_ AS alias FROM ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent INNER JOIN ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance ON (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.eventType = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType) AND (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.elementId = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId) INNER JOIN ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer ON (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsReferrer.analyticsEventId = ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.analyticsEventId) WHERE (ContentTargeting_TrackingActionInstance.campaignId = ?) AND (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) ORDER BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className AS className, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK AS classPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, COUNT(*) as count FROM ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent WHERE (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) AND (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK != 0) GROUP BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.className, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.classPK, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType ORDER BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC

SELECT ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId AS elementId, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType AS eventType, COUNT(*) as count FROM ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent WHERE (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate >= ?) AND (ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId != '') GROUP BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.elementId, ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.eventType ORDER BY ContentTargeting_Analytics_AnalyticsEvent.createDate DESC
